summary: The diff shows implementation of admin panel routing fixes with consolidated authentication and dashboard at /admin-panel. The route has been added to the router, and the AdminPanel component now handles both login and authenticated dashboard states. However, evidence for testing in production environment and verification of all acceptance criteria is limited due to diff truncation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify that the /admin-panel route loads without a black screen on the live domain and that users can successfully navigate to /admin-panel from the browser address bar without console errors
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows route configuration changes, but provides no evidence of production deployment verification, testing on the live domain (mhs-online-earn-platform.caffeine.xyz), or console error checking

missing_requirements.requirement: Verify that the route works correctly in both development and production environments
missing_requirements.reason: While the route is configured, there is no evidence in the diff showing testing or verification that the implementation works in both development and production environments
